content.text:
Sure, here is the title and the data description in English for an infographic:
Title: The Value of AI in Enhancing Employee Capabilities
Infographic Content:
   •  Central Image: An AI icon with arrows pointing
   •  Functional Areas and Statistics: 
      •  Procurement: 
         •  Icon: Shopping Cart 
         •  Statistic: 97% of executives believe employees
      •  Risk and Compliance:
         •  Icon: Shield
         •  Statistic: 93% of executives believe 
This format makes the information visually appealing and easy to understand at a glance.
That's awesome. I think our users will really appreciate the improvements.
